_sText:
Hello all!
Here i come with a new map that i've finished last week but didnt uploaded here.
So, i think you may know the original map cs_assaultgoban created by Barking Dog Studios and also the creator for  Backalley and i hated this map because of its poor texture design.

So for that i decided to create a modern remake but with some major updates like:
- i have eliminated the hostages
- the CT spawn is now inverted with T spawn. The terrorists have to make assault to plant the bomb in bombsite A or B.
- modern texture

So, credits go to:
- Original creator: Barking Dog Studios
- Texture used: saspatoon

If you play on this map and you enjoy it, please rate and comment.
